Topic.Title: DRIBBLES is waving the white flag again with all his ids

Message.Msg: I wanted tho thank-you for the kind words. I do the best I can at clearing the riff-raff from this board. It is only a matter of time before DRIBBLES is no longer posting here. He will be taking his fake sully (i.e. sullyinmass.2012) ids to other Yahoo boards, as he is not welcome on this one. DRIBBLES leads such a pathetic life. He is actually at the point where he thinks (and prays) he is me when he posts with his sullyinmass.2012 id. Sad, very sad indeed. Sully
Ebay is alienating it's sellers, unless it changes soon, they're going to die a slow death

Heck, he made $28 Million last year, most of it in incentives for the rise in stock price. Surely 20 Million reasons to bend eBay users (both buyer and sellers) over, dabble in creative accounting and blow a whole lotta smoke. By the time investors figure out they were duped, he'll be on to follow Smeg Whitman at HP after she's gotten through the first round of destroying the company.

The sad part is that eBay marketplace was built by the people using it. Before eBay went public, it was a thriving community. After going public, it's been a series of botched changes and disruptive innovation. It really is sad how greed can ruin such a great thing.
Ebay went public in 1998, it's glory days ran all the way until 2008. When we did auctions 90% sell thru was the norm and 100% sell thrus happened at least once a month. I WAS THERE! WERE YOU?

Been there since they were called AuctionWeb and bought shares on opening day. Yes, when the economy was better, 90% STR was not uncommon when running auctions. Now you know, Like many others, I've been seeing your ridiculous posts here, on eBay discussion boards, AuctionBytes, PSU and other places for over a decade. Never once, have I ever seen you post anything helpful or sincere. You've been kicked off most message boards for starting trouble. Your track record speaks for itself.

John Osborne based his "life" off of talking everyone's business and taunting people even when his facts and names were incorrect, so he shouldn't mind, now that he lives in trash alleys and off ramps, being reminded he was here every second of every day claiming at the same moment he was selling on ebay. He was not. As soon as John's wife found out what a public mess he made of z50com, she cut him lose the way they both cut lose their daughter and grandchild. I hope that helps. PS: Master, a lot of down recs. I smell Flyktning, Marin county's Patrick Mitchell.

Message.Title: Good Morning From Fabulous Philadelphia
Message.Msg: What a nice board we have. It will never be as nice as my friends, family and colleagues but thanks to all who make it happen. May it continue. May the good people live happily ever after. I hope that helps.

Yeah, the down rec's all come in at the same time, across different posts, etc. John's so technologically advanced, he's figured out he can use Firefox, IE, Chrome and Opera browsers to have 4 ID's active on the message boards at the same time. Some life, eh?
Be nicer if the Phillies were winning. Well, they won three in a row so maybe it's starting to turn around.

Message.Title: Poor B roke Fake Sullied. Last Board Troll Kneeling
Message.Msg: Poor broke fake Sullied! Those IDs aren't connected. Why do you want to be sullied you? You can never be me. Telling on yourself publicly dreaming of molesting livestock today? Crashing ebay with your filth again? Now bring out your tongue licking ID. All you have left is your sullied self to self. Note: no one else is sullied. ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!!!!!! Sully
I thought you were going to say the only philly he was interested in had cheese & onions. . .
Dude, I use only one ID 99.9% of the time, don't confuse me with Charlene
